sqlMap.select: SELECT SUBLINE_CD, SUBLINE_NAME FROM TABLE(Subline_List_Pkg.get_subline_list(#lineCd#))
SELECT SUBLINE_NAME FROM GIIS_SUBLINE WHERE SUBLINE_CD=#sublineCd#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rownum_, b.count_, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE (giis_subline_pkg.get_subline_cd_name(#lineCd#))
WHERE UPPER(subline_cd) LIKE UPPER(#findText#)
ORDER BY subline_cd
ORDER BY subline_name
ASC
DESC
) a, (SELECT count(*) count_ FROM TABLE (giis_subline_pkg.get_subline_cd_name(#lineCd#))
WHERE UPPER(subline_cd) LIKE UPPER(#findText#)
) b) WHERE rownum_ BETWEEN #from# AND #to#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rownum_, b.count_, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE (Giis_Subline_Pkg.get_subline_list(#lineCd#)) WHERE 1=1
UPPER(subline_name) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(subline_cd) LIKE UPPER(#findText#)
UPPER(subline_name) LIKE UPPER(#searchString#) OR UPPER(subline_cd) LIKE UPPER(#searchString#)
ORDER BY subline_cd
ORDER BY subline_name
ASC
DESC
) a, (SELECT count(*) count_ FROM TABLE (Giis_Subline_Pkg.get_subline_list(#lineCd#))
WHERE UPPER(subline_name) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(subline_cd) LIKE UPPER(#findText#)
) b) WHERE rownum_ BETWEEN #from# AND #to#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rownum_, b.count_, a.* FROM (select subline_cd, subline_name from table(giis_subline_pkg.get_exp_rep_subline_lov(#lineCd#))
WHERE (UPPER(subline_cd) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(subline_name) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) )

SELECT cpi.get_op_flag_giuts008a(#lineCd#,#sublineCd#) FROM DUAL

SELECT * FROM TABLE (Giis_Subline_Pkg.get_subline_list(#lineCd#)) WHERE subline_cd = #sublineCd#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rownum_, b.count_, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE (giis_subline_pkg.get_subline_lov(#lineCd#))
WHERE UPPER(subline_cd) like UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(subline_name) like UPPER(#findText#)

DESC

WHERE UPPER(subline_cd) like UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(subline_name) like UPPER(#findText#)

SELECT DISTINCT line_cd FROM giis_line ORDER BY line_cd
sqlMap.procedure:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rownum_, b.count_, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(GIIS_LINE_PKG.get_submaintain_line_list(#userId#))
WHERE 1=1
upper(line_cd) LIKE upper(#lineCd#)
upper(line_name) LIKE upper(#lineName#)
ORDER BY line_cd
ORDER BY line_name
ASC
DESC
)a, (SELECT count(*) count_ FROM TABLE(GIIS_LINE_PKG.get_submaintain_line_list(#userId#))
WHERE 1=1
upper(line_cd) LIKE upper(#lineCd#)
upper(line_name) LIKE upper(#lineName#)
) b) WHERE rownum_ BETWEEN #from# AND #to#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rownum_, b.count_, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(GIIS_SUBLINE_PKG.get_giis_subline_lov(#lineCd#))
WHERE 1=1
upper(subline_cd) LIKE upper(#sublineCd#)
upper(subline_name) LIKE upper(#sublineName#)
upper(subline_time) like upper(#sublineTime#)
upper(acct_subline_cd) LIKE upper(#acctSublineCd#)
min_prem_amt = #minPremAmt#
upper(remarks) LIKE upper(#remarks#)
ORDER BY subline_cd
ORDER BY subline_name
ORDER BY subline_time
ORDER BY acct_subline_cd
ORDER BY min_prem_amt
ORDER BY remarks
ORDER BY micro_sw
ORDER BY open_policy_sw
ORDER BY op_flag
ORDER BY allied_prt_tag
ORDER BY time_sw
ORDER BY no_tax_sw
ORDER BY exclude_tag
ORDER BY prof_comm_tag
ORDER BY non_renewal_tag
ORDER BY edst_sw
ORDER BY enrollee_tag
ASC
DESC
)a,(SELECT count(*) count_ FROM TABLE(GIIS_SUBLINE_PKG.get_giis_subline_lov(#lineCd#))
WHERE 1=1
upper(subline_cd) LIKE upper(#sublineCd#)
upper(subline_name) LIKE upper(#sublineName#)
upper(subline_time) like upper(#sublineTime#)
upper(acct_subline_cd) LIKE upper(#acctSublineCd#)
min_prem_amt = #minPremAmt#
upper(remarks) LIKE upper(#remarks#)
) b) WHERE rownum_ BETWEEN #from# AND #to#
sqlMap.select: SELECT GIIS_SUBLINE_PKG.validate_subline_del(#lineCd#, #sublineCd#) exist FROM DUAL

SELECT GIIS_SUBLINE_PKG.validate_acct_subline_cd(#lineCd#, #acctSublineCd#)exist FROM DUAL
SELECT GIIS_SUBLINE_PKG.validate_open_sw(#lineCd#) FROM DUAL
SELECT GIIS_SUBLINE_PKG.validate_op_flag(#lineCd#) FROM DUAL

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rownum_, b.count_, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(GIIS_SUBLINE_PKG.get_subline_lov_giuts022(#lineCd#, #search#))
WHERE 1=1
(subline_cd LIKE upper(#findText#) OR subline_name LIKE upper(#findText#))
ORDER BY subline_cd
ORDER BY subline_name
ASC
DESC
) a, (SELECT count(*) count_ FROM TABLE(GIIS_SUBLINE_PKG.get_subline_lov_giuts022(#lineCd#, #search#))
WHERE 1=1
(subline_cd LIKE upper(#findText#) OR subline_name LIKE upper(#findText#))
)b) WHERE rownum_ BETWEEN #from# AND #to#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, b.count_, rownum rownum_ FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE (GICLS220_PKG.get_gicls220_subline_lov(#lineCd#))
WHERE UPPER(subline_cd) LIKE UPPER(NVL(#findText# || '%', subline_cd)) OR UPPER(subline_name) LIKE UPPER(NVL(#findText# || '%', subline_name))
ORDER BY subline_cd
ORDER BY subline_name
ASC
DESC
) a, (SELECT count(*) count_ FROM TABLE (GICLS220_PKG.get_gicls220_subline_lov(#lineCd#))
WHERE UPPER(subline_cd) LIKE UPPER(NVL(#findText# || '%', subline_cd)) OR UPPER(subline_name) LIKE UPPER(NVL(#findText# || '%', subline_name))
) b ) WHERE rownum_ BETWEEN #from# AND #to#

ASC
DESC

WHERE UPPER(subline_name) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(subline_cd) LIKE UPPER(#findText#)

ASC
DESC

WHERE UPPER(subline_name) LIKE UPPER(#findText#) OR UPPER(subline_cd) LIKE UPPER(#findText#)

) b) WHERE rownum_ BETWEEN #from# AND #to#
